DOC.brief_summary: The study determine long-term outcome patient coronary triple vessel disease ( TVD ) real world China , three different treatment strategy : percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) , Coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) optimal medication therapy ( OMT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Outcome Triple-vessel Coronary Artery Disease Underwent Three Different Strategies ( LOTUS )
DOC.detailed_description: About 10,000 participant enrol retrospective study . Study coordinator include men woman age 18 angiographic prove triple-vessel disease 15 year long-term . Detailed procedural data obtain study coordinator local principal investigator . These data enter electronic data capture system . Participants telephone follow-up interview conduct centralized follow-up center Fuwai Hospital .
